short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create an interesting experience and show your personal style by customizing Facebook color and background photo.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool supports changing colors and background images of Facebook.

The demo interface is available.

Version 2.0.5: Highlight icons
